statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE trade_type='buy';
SELECT trade_price, trade_volume FROM market_data WHERE exchange_name='Binance' ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT trade_type, count(*) AS trade_count FROM market_data GROUP BY trade_type;
SELECT asset_pair, MAX(trade_price) AS max_price FROM market_data GROUP BY asset_pair HAVING max_price > 5000;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE trade_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE trade_type='Buy' ORDER BY trade_price DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, asset_pair, trade_volume FROM market_data WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(trade_price), MIN(trade_price), AVG(trade_price) FROM market_data WHERE exchange_name='Binance';
SELECT exchange_name, COUNT(*) AS num_trades FROM market_data WHERE trade_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY exchange_name;
SELECT exchange_name, asset_pair, trade_price FROM market_data WHERE exchange_name='Coinbase' AND asset_pair='BTC/USDT' ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, token_address, price, timestamp FROM market_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE token_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT id, token_address, price FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT token_address FROM market_data;
SELECT id, price, timestamp FROM historical_price WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, token_address, price FROM historical_price WHERE token_address='0x123456' AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, token_address, ROUND(price*2, 6) AS doubled_price FROM market_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id
SELECT DISTINCT(token_address) FROM historical_price WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM market_data WHERE token_address IN ('0xABCDEF', '0x987654')
SELECT * FROM market_data
SELECT id, exchange_name, token_pair, last_price FROM market_data ORDER BY last_price DESC
SELECT token_pair, volume FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT exchange_name, country FROM exchanges
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, token_pair, volume FROM market_data WHERE last_price > 100 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT MAX(last_price) AS highest_price, MIN(last_price) AS lowest_price FROM market_data WHERE token_pair = 'BTC/USD';
SELECT e.exchange_name, count(*) AS number_of_pairs FROM exchanges e JOIN market_data m ON e.exchange_name = m.exchange_name GROUP BY e.exchange_name;
SELECT m.exchange_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_prices FROM market_data m LEFT JOIN historical_prices h ON m.token_pair = h.token_pair GROUP BY m.exchange_name;
SELECT symbol, last_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000
SELECT * FROM historical_price WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT symbol, high_price FROM historical_price ORDER BY high_price DESC
SELECT exchange_name, trading_pair, trade_volume FROM exchange_data WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY trade_volume DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE action = 'login'
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, last_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY last_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol, market_name FROM market_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY symbol, market_name;
SELECT * FROM historical_price WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM exchange_data GROUP BY exchange_name HAVING max_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM market_data
SELECT token_name, last_price FROM market_data WHERE market_id = 1
SELECT token_name, token_symbol, volume FROM market_data ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_price WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT total_volume, trade_count FROM decentralized_exchanges
SELECT token_name, last_price, volume FROM market_data WHERE market_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM historical_price ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, total_trades, total_earned FROM user_activity WHERE total_trades > 100 ORDER BY total_earned DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, tokens_supported, total_volume FROM decentralized_exchanges WHERE total_volume > 100000 ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
SELECT tokens_pair, reserve_1, reserve_2, total_liquidity FROM liquidity_pools WHERE total_liquidity > 1000 ORDER BY reserve_1 ASC, reserve_2 DESC;
